> [nofish](#comment_896_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Packing a bitcoin, ipfs, namecoin, etc. into one big, monolithic application would reduce the portability of ZeroNet , would use much more resources and by that make it impossible to run on mobile, so there is no plans on doing that. 
> But it's easy to extend ZeroNet by plugins, so anyone can add his/her favorite protocol.

I think it is wrong to consider the P2P network formed by the mobile now. Because the mobile's storage capacity is too small. We must consider a sufficient number of personal computers to form a basic network. To have enough people to use zeronet, in order to have enough personal computers to form the underlying network.

To attract enough people to use, first you must  have an attractive thing. Zerotalk is ok. And the development of zerotalk technology has all have, upload pictures, embed video, set up the administrator, just need to integrate it.

This does not require Packing a bitcoin, ipfs, namecoin, etc. into one big, monolithic application.

If zerotalk builds a basic network, there is a technical problem that has not yet been solved, and the establishment and maintenance of large-scale P2P database. I think this is the real problem and development of zeronet will face to.

For example, from 100000 personal computers constitute zeronet basic network, each computer to take 30G hard drive capacity, 100000X30G = 3000T. So big a P2P database, how to build? How to run How to maintain This is the real problem.

Once zeronet can build a stable base network, the number of personal computers will be far more than 100,000 units. On this basis, is to consider when the mobile to join.

Before the foundation network is established, no matter how smart a person is, no matter how much favorite protocol can increase, will not succeed.

> [hexkey](#comment_23_18NsJqjikBYBjwLzMVp7aBJSpqtyRSd9qF): People use a lot of mobile devices, and being able to use Zeronet on them would make people like it more. Also, streaming data instead of downloading is becoming more popular (like Netflix/Spotify/Youtube), so being able to do some amount of that is a good idea too.
> 
> That example isn't totally right. A network can be very redundant, or have high capacity, but having more of one means having less of the other. You can have more of each, but that's much harder. (this page explains it a little more).
> For example, if there was only one site with a size of 30GB, then the whole network can only store 30GB. I know it's not really like that--but in the real network, just adding up the storage of each device isn't correct.

I know that mobile phone applications are more extensive, but by the personal computer constitute a basic network is more feasible. The advantage of P2P networks lies in the storage space of a large number of personal computers. If you do not make full use of the personal computer's spare storage space, compared with the internet network there is no advantage. Mobile phone can be connected to the server, there is no need to use zeronet.

Streaming data is good idea, but too much attention to it is not necessary. Twister is to rely entirely on streaming data, the result is not received posts. Of course, this problem can be solved, to reduce the distribution of old posts in the node on the line, but this again complicated the problem.

I can see from your reply, you also know that a huge P2P database operation and maintenance is a difficult point.（But having more of one means having less of the other. You can have more of each, but that's much harder.）

> [lightrabbit](#comment_6_1Kr2JfCsBYQU1z96xQsYTshKvJ5nz4mTG3): 额……可能你没理解我问的这个问题和作者的回答……意思都是关于优化大文件传输的，里面的分片只是保证能完整传输大文件的方法。从用户体验来说，用户发布的是一个完整的大文件，另外一边用户拿到的也是完整的大文件。只是在ZeroNet中，这个大文件会从多个用户获取文件分片，并且对每个分片进行完整性校验后，在文件夹中保存成一个完整的大文件。就像是内置实现了BT的功能。

> [rwxy](#comment_2_1G2KAr146veEMjvkrhD3sXMUH1fAuZdswM): 为什么零网不抗墙？ 能简单说下原理吗

任何封锁网络的技术都必须通过服务器进行，也就是由服务器上运行的程序来实行封锁。理论上，P2P技术是不需要服务器的，只要2台计算机之间有连接线就可以传输数据。比如一个小区，所有的电脑都必须在小区的“中继点”汇合，然后连接的网络公司的服务器，也就是说，一个小区所有的电脑，在连接到服务器之前，它们都是连接在一起的。也就是说，一个小区所有的电脑，在理论上都是可以互相传输数据的，而且服务器是无法干预的。因为在还没有达到服务器的时候，它们已经传输数据了。
所以，P2P技术理论上是不可封锁的。

topic.body: P2P developers should be aware that a large number of old computers are idle.These old computer hard disk is 320G, P2P development should make full use of these old computer hard disk capacity.
topic.title: These old computer hard disk is 320G

topic.body:
For zeronet, as long as we can easily do their own blog, can post, send pictures, can send 10m short video, blog owners have enough space, such as 10g-20g, blog followers can Decided not to take up too much hard disk capacity, such as 1g, so zeronet has been successful.

Forum, social functions can be resolved later.
topic.title: What is the success of zeronet?

topic.body:
Zeroblog build our own blog fairly easy, although the initial node to get some problems, but can be established, the problem can be put into the future optimization.

topic.title: 在零网建立个人自己的油管频道才能推广零网
topic.body:
要想尽快的推广零网的使用，我想只有3个办法。

1,在零网博客建立10几个新闻网站，每天发布国内外的新闻。可是现在海外的新闻网站都不肯进来，现在零网上发布新闻的几个站点如陆公子的博客，西域武僧的博客，新闻量都不够，更新也太慢，数量也太少，这样无法推动零网发展。那么是不是能有其他个人来建新闻博客呢，我感到也不容易。或者几个人合作建立新闻论坛，或许还有些可能。

2,能让大家做自己的群组。这个需要能发图片，而且图片还得能显示在主页上。现在的几种论坛，ZeroTalk不能发图片，ZeroNet Central与IFS 倒是完全成功了，可是中国人不喜欢这种形式，ZeroTalk with image图片又不能显示在主页上，zerome除了技术上还不完备，五毛，共特一大堆，让人对zerome保持了很大的戒心，这些都限制了零网的发展。

3,零网的视频网站能像油管那样具有丰富的资源。可是现在零网的视频网站大都不太行。而且最主要的是资源实在太少，又杂乱。

所以能够推广零网发展的3个办法现在几乎都不行。

我认为目前唯一可行的是打通零网与油管的连接。按Fastcast站点的方法，在零网建立个人自己的油管频道，这样资源比较集中，也很丰富，可以快速推广零网的使用。

而且站点一旦能够成功建立，就可以生产基于零网的电视机机顶盒，可以有商业利益。这样就能更快的推广零网的使用。机顶盒可以外接硬盘运行。这样，机顶盒24小时运行，零网的节点就会非常多，网络的传输速度将比现在高出100倍。

topic.title: 开发单纯的图片论坛
topic.body:
本来我打算再过段时间提的，有人正在开发零网直播嘛，开发了直播就可以延伸开发零网电视的嘛，这是顺理成章的事。当然要先等这些开发完成。

不过我看到有人在论坛上增加上传图片功能。为了避免开发走弯路，浪费了宝贵的时间。我还是现在提一下。

1,不要在纯文字论坛中增加图片上传功能，开发单纯的图片上传论坛，功能简单，这样开发比较快。图片上传的模块网上有，直接拿来就可以。当然不是为了开发比较简单，是考虑以后数据库的使用。

论坛一般不会有长篇大论的文章，所以纯文字的论坛占用的存储空间是很小的，所有的数据都可以存储到每个参与者的电脑或者手机上，不必用数据库分散存储。我们要有点前瞻性，手机的存储空间也会越来越大的。

但是图片不同，增加了图片上传功能，存储量会增加很多。现在不用考虑数据库，但是迟早总要考虑这个问题的。

虽然一个论坛中有文字也有图片，我们可以把文字与图片分开来处理，不过总是比不上单纯的图片论坛所有的数据一起处理来得方便。不要把简单的问题复杂化。

2,现在不用考虑数据库问题，只要把所有的图片都设计成可选文件，让大家根据自己的设备做选择，使用电脑的可以多存储一些，使用移动设备的可以少存储一些，以后才考虑数据库分散存储，这样简单一些。图片文件的大小限制在200k以内，大于200k不能上传。

3,可以考虑上传短视频，不要超过10M。太大的文件同步效果不好。

4,设计上要方便移植。对已经做了纯文字论坛的人，只要复制几个文件进去，就可以增加一个图片论坛，当然这需要在原来的文字论坛中增加一个页面。互相不能有冲突。

topic.title: Now the main problem is to connect the node too little, too fixed.
topic.body:
A site even if there are more than 1000 connectable nodes, but the actual connection of the node is generally only 3-5. And as far as I can judge, the 3-5 nodes of this connection are very fixed, each time connecting the same nodes.

This is very difficult to synchronize, one can not be synchronized, it may be a week, or a few weeks can not be synchronized until you connect the 3-5 nodes to update in order to synchronize.

The solution is to increase the number of nodes connected to. There are more than 1000 nodes can be connected, the actual connection of the node should be increased to dozens, or even hundreds of.

Another solution is to constantly replace the connected nodes. You can replace the new connection node every 5 minutes or 10 minutes.

topic.title: 5-step development of zeronet WIFI interconnection
topic.body:
1, the development of two devices, two clients, in the same WIFI device synchronization data.

2, the development of multiple devices multiple clients in the same WIFI device synchronization data.

3, the development of two devices of the two clients in the two can be connected to the WIFI device synchronization data.

4, the development of multiple devices multiple clients in the two can be connected to the WIFI device synchronization data.
5, Multiple clients that develop multiple devices synchronize data on multiple WIFI devices that can be connected.

Synchronize data with WIFI should be very fast, much faster than synchronizing data over the Internet. And should be able to synchronize long video files.

topic.title: 现在可以将开发重点放到网络基础层面
topic.body:
零网应用层面的基础开发基本上可以了，虽然还有一些需要开发，可以放到以后再说。在基础层面以上的应用开发可以让大家自行发挥。

长视频播放还有点问题，不过这很容易改进，只要将视频文件切割到500K，问题就解决了。

现在可以将开发重点放到网络基础层面。网络基础层面的开发目前主要有2点。

1,开发零网WIFI互联。

2,零网网络绕过ISP。现在的P2P技术并不是真正的P2P，它依然依赖着互联网。要进入零网的网络，还是得先与ISP连接。不然还是无法进入零网网络的。但是这却不是必须的，因为零网的数据传输并不需要互联网的介入。

网络基础层面的开发还有另外2个方面，不过可以放在以后。

1,增加客户端的连接数。

2,提高多路传输的能力。现在零网节点之间的传输，几乎都是单个节点的传输，并没有实现多路传输。没有体现出P2P网络的传输优势。

topic.title: It is now possible to focus development on the network infrastructure
topic.body:
Zero-network application level of the basic development can be temporarily stopped, although there are many aspects of the need to develop, you can put into the future development. The basis of the above level of application development can let everyone play.

Long video playback is still a problem, but it is easy to improve, the video file cut to 500K, the problem is solved.

It is now possible to focus development on the network infrastructure. The development of the network infrastructure level is currently 2 points.

1, the development of zero network WIFI interconnection.

2, zeronet network bypass ISP. Now P2P technology is not really P2P, it still depends on the Internet. To enter the zeronet network, you must first connect with the ISP. Otherwise still can not enter zeronet. But this is not necessary, because zeronet data transmission does not require the intervention of the Internet.

There are two other aspects of the development of the network infrastructure level, but can be placed later.

1, increase the number of client connections.

2, to improve the capacity of multiple transmission. Now the transmission between zero-network nodes, almost all of a single node transmission, and did not achieve multiple transmission. Did not reflect the transmission advantages of P2P networks.

topic.title: 至少每个人都应该把自己的站点放到机顶盒中
topic.body:
现在的机顶盒都有8G，很多人的站点都不到10M，机顶盒有足够的空间运行零网，至少每个人都应该把自己的站点放到机顶盒中，24小时运行，方便别人同步。如果机顶盒上安装的app很少，还可以关注几个别人的站点。
当然最好是用树莓派24小时运行，树莓派可以关注很多站点。

topic.title: Zeronet need to improve
topic.body:
1,Andrews version in the TV box and raspberry pie is very easy to halt, and UI server websocket easy to lost connection.

It is estimated that the CPU can not process the data correctly after receiving the data.

2,Need to compile the installation package can be installed directly on the raspberry pie linux system.

The zeronet network relies on 24-hour, low-cost devices that can not rely on cell phones.

3,Long video 1M fragments can not be downloaded normally, you need to cut into 500k fragments.

4,Zeronet forum need to develop image publishing capabilities.

topic.title: My view on twister development
topic.body:
In fact, twister is not complicated, is an account corresponding to a block. There is no difference in theory if there is a block that can register 10 accounts. A block corresponds to an account or the corresponding 10 accounts are the same. Corresponding to an account easy to understand.

Twister There are several problems now: It is difficult to receive new tweets; Avatars sometimes have, sometimes not; Repeatedly received a number of tweets, these are caused by same reason. Is the structural design issues，not about code.

In fact, twister is to complicate the simple problem.

An account corresponds to a block, as long as the account of all the information and data are placed in the corresponding block, so Avatar has been there, will not be gone. Will not repeatedly receive some tweets, of course, can receive new tweets.

Because when you focus on an account, all the data in the block corresponding to this account, except the key, is transmitted to you.

However, each person has a different number of tweets, so the size of the block should be different. Some people send a large amount of a day, he needs the corresponding block larger.

Twister can maintain the data every 24 hours, resize all the blocks. To push more blocks to expand adjustment.

Of course, each block needs to be adjusted over time.

The same applies if the size of the blocks must be the same. As long as each block corresponds to a data block. All the information except the key of this block is stored in this corresponding data block, and all the data blocks are adjusted every 24 hours. This is called data maintenance.

In this way, twister existing problems can be solved.

The current development of twister does not require too much storage capacity, this issue should be put into consideration later. Image upload, video upload are solved. Then think about it.

The solution to storage is theoretically not complicated. Bigger data blocks are allocated as P2P databases. Just what is the effect of P2P database, not easy to say.

topic.title: I think the reason for poor transmission is here
topic.body:
To the right of your site of interest, open the menu to see the amount of data uploaded and downloaded by this site.

You can see that the amount of data you upload is very small, no matter how much time you focus on this site, and how long you are online, the upload volume has been very small.It does not matter whether the port is open or not.

That is, you are concerned about a site, and can not help this site to transfer data. Only one node is provided.

In other words, the amount of attention on a site, which is the number of nodes, nothing to do with the data synchronization effect. Only related to whether it is easy to find this site.

In this way, the video becomes very difficult to transmit, because the video data volume is bigger.
